attributes.action: change the law on taking any bags past secutity at all airports in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
change the law on all passanges flying
from any airport in England i think this would make it a lot safer if all your stuff was in the hold of the plane and it would also make it a bit easy for the security staff at all airports if all you had on you was cash passport keys to many people are taking to much on to the plane and this needs to stop for all are security
